references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), a foundational method for novel view synthesis that heavily influences the 3D reconstruction models in this paper.

references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3d objects
references.reason: This paper introduces the Objaverse dataset, a large-scale dataset of 3D objects used as a benchmark and comparison for the LRM-Zero model in this paper.

references.paper_title: GS-LRM: Large reconstruction model for 3d gaussian splatting
references.reason: This paper introduces the GS-LRM model architecture, which is the backbone model used in the LRM-Zero framework and a key component of the experimental results.

references.paper_title: On the opportunities and risks of foundation models
references.reason: This paper provides an overview of foundation models, a key area of research that contextualizes the development of LRM-Zero as a foundation model for 3D reconstruction.
This paper introduces the Transformer architecture, a crucial component in many large-scale models including LRM-Zero, which explains its use in this paper.
